entry.summary:
Re To understand what this partnership with @pushprotocol @Push_DAO means for 𝗪𝗢𝗢𝗣 𝗣𝗔𝗬 — see the tweet below, for a super quick explanation ⬇️
Woop Pay: Woop Pay is a web application built by @developer_dao and @d_d_agency_web3 to create cryptocurrency payment requests. By integrating PUSH, we're taking a step forward in making cryptocurrency payments easier for everyone

entry.title: Huge news from the 𝗪𝗢𝗢𝗣 𝗣𝗔𝗬 (@woop_pay) team 🚀 a partnership with @pushprotocol @Push_DAO under their grant program, to bring ...
entry.summary:
Huge news from the 𝗪𝗢𝗢𝗣 𝗣𝗔𝗬 (@woop_pay) team 🚀 a partnership with @pushprotocol @Push_DAO under their grant program, to bring users real-time updates on payment requests. This project was born out of Developer DAO’s own 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆 (@d_d_agency_web3) 🎉 Check it out ⬇️
Woop Pay: Woop Pay has partnered with @pushprotocol as part of their grant program to bring you more convenience! Users will receive real-time updates on payment requests with Push notifications, making it easier to keep track of your transactions. Get started at http://wooppay.xyz
